name: @9am/img-victor
description: Web component coverting img to SVG

scripts.build:worker: cd lib/workers/lsd && emcc -Oz --memory-init-file 0 -sWASM=0 -sEXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_malloc', '_free', '_lsd']" -sALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -sMODULARIZE=1 --pre-js pre.js --extern-post-js post.js lsd.c -o index.js

author: 9am
